text: @Konservativer 🇩🇪👀 Did you know that many surgical site infections after spinal surgery are caused by microbes already on the patient's skin? 🤯 New research sheds light on this persistent problem and highlights the importance of proper skin preparation before surgery. 💉🔬 #SurgicalSiteInfections #SpineSurgery #PatientSafety💭 It's time to rethink our approach to surgical site infections.
